data.name: Trash Story Soundtrack
data.detailed_description:
This DLC contains six songs not included in the base game. All songs are performed by me.
All music will be in a base game directory, after the installation.

Attention: The sound quality is rather low and not processed. You can hear form of noise from the microphone. Something like lo-fi quality..
